parsed.recap: DEV: Rance's wild Mage-Gift awakened during bandit attack; obliterated Lisle village; Companion Senta Chose him; red robes found hidden under bandit clothing—organized attack suggesting Karse; prisoner-taking indicates blood magic revival; four-day ride to Haven completed; Rance unconscious from Gift-shock throughout journey; arrived Haven; Healers alerted to wild talent danger. PEND: Rance's memories of attack still blocked; nature of rare Gift unconfirmed beyond Firestarting; fate of Lisle prisoners unknown; Karse blood magic threat assessment needed; Queen's Circle briefing imminent; red-robed attackers may return; Rance's Gift untrained, dangerous.

entities.c: Obliterated by Rance's awakening wild Gift during bandit attack
